alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Coke; Shackelford; Sterling; Taylor; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 24 at 3:09AM CST until December 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR BIG COUNTRY AND NORTHERN CONCHO VALLEY FOR 20 FOOT WINDS OF 20 MPH OR MORE...RELATIVE HUMIDITIES OF 15 PERCENT OR LESS AND A HIGH FIRE DANGER... The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 6 PM CST this evening. * Wind...20 TO 25 mph with gusts over 30 mph possible * Humidity...15 to 20 percent * Fuels...Extremely dry * Impacts...With gusty winds...near record high temperatures... and low relative humidity values, any fires that develop will spread rapidly. Outdoor burning, and any outdoor activity that may produce flames or sparks is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will occur shortly. A combination of strong winds, low humidity and dry fuels will contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Callahan; Coke; Shackelford; Sterling; Taylor; Throckmorton
